product_name: The North Face Momentum Thermal Half-Zip Top - Men's
long_description: The Momentum Thermal half-zip top from The North Face delivers lightweight, unrestricted warmth as a versatile mid layer or a effective outer layer as the pace of your cross-country skiing increases. Constructed with wicking FlashDry(TM) fibers throughout to manage moisture and speed drying when you're working up a sweat on the trail. Body-mapped FlashDry panels down the back and sides and under the arms improve breathability and mobility. When your hands need light protection in chilly weather, pull the mitts out from the internal cuffs and over your fingers. Zip neck provides extra coverage when fully zipped, or quick ventilation when unzipped. Rear easy-access pocket secures your energy gels and car keys. 360deg reflectivity maximizes your visibility after dusk on the trails or the road. Reflectivity at zip; thumbholes; shaped hem; contract flatlocked stitching; reflective logo.
